title: Who is Morde Supposed to be good against?
body:
I am not even sure I really understand who I'm supposed to be good against as a morde main... 

I used to think I was a good anti-assassin/burst champ because of my sustain and anti burst tools. 
I used to think i was good against tanks because I had some nice %hp destroy synergy. 

I used to think I was shit against adc's because of my lack of mobility... 

Now I find myself dying too fast to fight burst champions. 
I find tanks ccing me to death while I stand there doing nothing. 
Adc's still kite the shit out of me... 

What am I even supposed to be as a champion besides "take dragon get secondary objective with dragon"?

I'm not sure if this should be a plz buff morde, or a plz nerf damage thread...

Morde is a great champion and he is good against everyone if the enemy jungler is afk/boosted/bot .

Mordekaiser's considered strong against most tanks and fighters. He's somewhat good against juggernauts but some just beat him out {{champion:420}}. 
Mordekaiser used to go even with {{champion:122}}  but the recent damage buffs sort of tipped the scale towards axe boi. 
Mordekaiser stomps on {{champion:86}}  if you prepare everything when he goes in.
{{champion:83}}  depends on how you play. But you'll mostly win because his zombies are coded like monsters so you get a full heal from them. Plus you can auto reset with Q to escape his wall during laning phase.

Two champs that Mordekaiser stomps on most of the time are {{champion:157}} and {{champion:92}} you poke with E knocking out Yasuo's sheild and when he goes in you out damage him because Q bonks to strong and W heals to good. You can use your E when Riven goes to farm to force her to either take it or burn E to avoid the damage.

He counters {{champion:6}} at about level 4 and beyond that because of your heal.

Mordekaiser falls off late game until flash comes up. He's basically a different champion when his flash is up, he goes from a carry trying to survive in team fights to a massive back line threat that can one shot squishes with his combo at about 400AP.

Keystone wise I take Phase rush because it's easy to proc with Mordekaiser's kit but also it lets him make good trades with champions that he would normally not be able to trade with. It also lets him follow champions with dashes that try to escape. But again always change your runes for what you're against. 

You might consider taking glacial augment and rush spooky ghosts for the slow so people can't escape when you fight them. Personally I haven't tried it yet but I do plan to at some point.

Personally I think Mordekaiser's short comings don't only come from his lack of mobility but from his lack of base defense stats. He has low base HP and Armour for a melee champ making him easy pickings for ad champions in any role. This is most likely to compensate for Mordekaiser's passive. But it still bites him in the ass due to how feast or famine it is.

What’s interesting is he used to have both better base stats and better shielding... I’m not really sure why he can’t have either of them. He could even keep his dragon if they made his hp gains when he has dragon smaller.

Am Morde main can confirm, a decent Gnar will just kite the fuck out of you and chase you when you run. It's a feelsbadman matchup.

He used to be able to go toe to toe with other bruisers, but a lot of bruisers have gotten powercreeped over him.
